name: live-task-board-cloudflare
description: Real-time task board built with Cloudflare Workers and D1

scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages publish dist
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:worker && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.db:create: cd worker && wrangler d1 create live-task-board
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd worker && wrangler d1 migrations apply live-task-board --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cd worker && wrangler d1 migrations apply live-task-board --remote
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:migrate:remote
scripts.setup: npm install && cd worker && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Cloudflare Workers Demo
